artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
description: half page; landscape view with boats at left and center middle ground; boat with sail at right; figures behind railing on shore in LLC; mountain peak in background right of center, from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
markings: Censor seals: 米良 {Mera}, 渡辺 {Watanabe}; Publisher seal: 佐野喜 {Sanoki}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji (Fuji sanjūrokkei 不二三十六景)
title: Tsukada Island by Eitai Bridge in Edo from the series "36 Views of Mt Fuji"
